price: ߊ߬ ߘߏ߲߬ ߖߌ߰ߣߍ߲߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߊ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߞߊ߬ ߘߎ߱ ߣߌ߫ ߛߊ߲߫ ߞߘߐߕߊ߬ߣߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߊ߲߫
arabic: تَنزِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلۡعُلَى

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlan mimman khalaqa al-arḍa wal-samāwāti al-ʿulā
